column4: i just ate a bacon and cheese sandwich (bacon cooked with cheese then the grease drizzled on the bread to "toast" it.)
and it was still cold when I bit into it
yes
bacon from a pig
undercooked underrated
very tasty, i support bacon anyday
I don't love bacon
it gives me worms
but the worms let me stay the same weight
i eat for 3 and i stay the same size
that's nice.  #ubuntu-offtopic
no, this is a support channel, general chatter belongs in #ubuntu-offtopic
you already have it, don't you?
when i try to mount a ntfs partition it says that ntfs is an unknown fs
what command are you using?
try giving it a -t ntfs
and actually, ntfs uses dmask and fmask
er... no it doesn't.  b
What version of ubuntu are you using?
I guess yeah, for some reason your kernel doesn't have ntfs support built in, you'll have to look towards the other stuff, find an open source one (not a wrapper of XP libraries)
ctothej, doubt edgy will get OOo 2.2.  Backports only happen for really big stuff.
